}}'''''A New Power is Rising''''' is the first track of the album [[Let Mortal Heroes Sing Your Fame]] by the band [[Summoning]]. The song name is possibly taken from the words of [[Saruman]] to [[Gandalf]] during the latter's imprisonment in the tower of [[Orthanc]] as told in [[The Fellowship of the Ring]].<ref>{{FR|Council}}</ref> The lyrics are in the [[Black Speech]], and are the [[Ring Verse|inscription]] written on the [[The One Ring|One Ring]].<ref>{{FR|Shadow}}</ref>
